data.title: Human Rights Film Festival Berlin
data.text:
Katja Riemann: Art and Activism â€“ Strengthening Human Rights Through Creative Work

Acclaimed actress, director and writer Katja Riemann crafts stories that get people thinking. Her works often shine the spotlight on brave individuals combating injustice. Join us as we explore the delicate balance between her acting career and her activism, infused with a hint of humour.
